Html: Any plans to update the Prism 4.0 to use Unity 2.1?

We'll update to the latest Unity release when we update the library for .Net 4.5/SL5, which won't start until next year.  I wouldn't anticipate any problems with using Unity 2.1 with the existing bits, although I haven't actually tried it.
Just tried to update to Unity 2.1 and it fails because of "Microsoft.Practices.Prism.UnityExtensions.dll" having a reference to "Microsoft.Practices.Unity.dll, Version 2.0.414.0" :(
